result.eng: The hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ga: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.orig: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.html: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ponchtml: Ainmníoḋ an halla i ndiaiḋ Naoṁ PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.

result.eng: The work will be easier after a while.
result.ga: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.html: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.

result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ga: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.html: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí láċ i dtús báire aċ d'aṫraiġ sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.

result.eng: What dod you do after the meeting?
result.ga: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.orig: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.html: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnitheWhat dod you do after the meeting?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaiḋ an ċruinniṫeWhat dod you do after the meeting?

result.eng: She detained the children after school.
result.ga: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.orig: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.html: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoileShe detained the children after school.
result.ponchtml: Ċoimeád sí na páistí i ndiaiḋ am scoileShe detained the children after school.

result.eng: She left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ga: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.orig: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.html: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí é i ndiaiḋ di sásaṁ a ḃaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.
result.ponchtml: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaiḋ blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: A month after that.
result.ga: Mí ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Mí ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Mí ina dhiaidh sinA month after that.
result.ponchtml: Mí ina ḋiaiḋ sinA month after that.

result.eng: He was set free after five years in prison.
result.ga: Scaoileadh saor é tar éis cúig bliana sa phríosún
result.orig: Scaoileadh saor é tar éis cúig bliana sa phríosún
result.html: Scaoileadh saor é tar éis cúig bliana sa phríosúnHe was set free after five years in prison.
result.ponchtml: Scaoileaḋ saor é tar éis cúig bliana sa ṗríosúnHe was set free after five years in prison.

result.eng: You will get an e-mail after you register.
result.ga: Seolfar ríomhphost chugat tar éis duit clárú
result.orig: Seolfar ríomhphost chugat tar éis duit clárú
result.html: Seolfar ríomhphost chugat tar éis duit clárúYou will get an e-mail after you register.
result.ponchtml: Seolfar ríoṁṗost ċugat tar éis duit clárúYou will get an e-mail after you register.

result.eng: She walked after me.
result.ga: Shiúil sí i mo dhiaidh
result.orig: Shiúil sí i mo dhiaidh
result.html: Shiúil sí i mo dhiaidhShe walked after me.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil sí i mo ḋiaiḋShe walked after me.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ga: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile
result.orig: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile
result.html: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéileThousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ponchtml: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaiḋ bliana ċun páirt a ġlacaḋ san ḟéileThousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.

result.eng: After all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ga: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.orig: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.html: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteachAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis an aiġnis ar fad d'éiriġ linn teaċt ar réiteaċAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.

result.eng: After all, he is a politician, it is his job.
result.ga: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab é
result.orig: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab é
result.html: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab éAfter all, he is a politician, it is his job.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab éAfter all, he is a politician, it is his job.

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: After a stormy night I would go out on the beach.
result.ga: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an trá
result.orig: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an trá
result.html: Tar éis oíche stoirme théinnse amach ar an tráAfter a stormy night I would go out on the beach.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis oíċe stoirme ṫéinnse amaċ ar an tráAfter a stormy night I would go out on the beach.

result.eng: Turn left after the hotel.
result.ga: Tiontaigh ar chlé tar éis an óstáin
result.orig: Tiontaigh ar chlé tar éis an óstáin
result.html: Tiontaigh ar chlé tar éis an óstáinTurn left after the hotel.
result.ponchtml: Tiontaiġ ar ċlé tar éis an óstáinTurn left after the hotel.

result.eng: I am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.html: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gailliṁ inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.

result.eng: After that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
result.ga: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtain
result.orig: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtain
result.html: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtainAfter that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
result.ponchtml: Ina ḋiaiḋ sin is breá liom dul go dtí an ṗictiúrlann i nGailliṁ uair sa tseaċtainAfter that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.

result.eng: I always go to the Tí Neachtain pub after seeing a play.
result.ga: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáil
result.orig: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáil
result.html: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáilI always go to the Tí Neachtain pub after seeing a play.
result.ponchtml: Téim Tí Neaċtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a ḟeiceáilI always go to the Tí Neachtain pub after seeing a play.

result.eng: Won't Ros na Rún be on after that?
result.ga: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl ina dhiaidh sinWon't Ros na Rún be on after that?
result.ponchtml: Naċ mbeiḋ Ros na Rún ar siúl ina ḋiaiḋ sinWon't Ros na Rún be on after that?

result.eng: I was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.html: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag cuiṁneaṁ ba ḃreá liom a ḋul ċuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.

result.eng: I'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ga: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
result.orig: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
result.html: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhóI'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ponchtml: Bím an-tuirseaċ tar éis na hoibre aċ téim amaċ oíċe nó ḋóI'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ga: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.orig: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.html: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dóiḃ filleaḋ aḃaile ḃuail an Príoṁ-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.

result.eng: Things were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ga: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa Ghearmáin
result.orig: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa Ghearmáin
result.html: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa GhearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúrsaí contúirteaċ tar éis urġaḃáil ċuṁaċta na Naitsiṫe sa ĠearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre seaċtainí i ndiaiḋ na n-ionsaiṫe rinne fórsaí Ṁeiriceá ionruaṫar isteaċ san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: They carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ga: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad ionruaṫar ar an Iaráic bliain go leiṫ ina ḋiaiḋ sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.

result.eng: Have you got enough? {after beating}
result.ga: An bhfuil do sháith agat

result.html: An bhfuil do sháith agatHave you got enough? {after beating}
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil do ẛáiṫ agatHave you got enough? {after beating}

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
result.ga: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
